CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Soybeans?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Soybeans is arc {Wheat}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Wheat?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Wheat is arc {Soybeans}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Corn to Soybeans in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Barley to Wheat in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Soybeans and Corn in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Soybeans and Corn is {197}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Corn and Wheat in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Corn and Wheat is {28}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Corn?
SC.A: The total flow output from Corn is {297}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Wheat?
SC.A: The total flow input by Wheat is {207}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 123? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {126} from {Barley} to {Wheat}, a flow of {191} from {Corn} to {Soybeans}, a flow of {197} from {Soybeans} to {Corn}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 60? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {28} from {Corn} to {Wheat}, a flow of {53} from {Soybeans} to {Wheat}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 88 and 103? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {98} from {Wheat} to {Barley}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Corn to Barley or from Barley to Corn?
NC.A: The flow from {Barley} to {Corn} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Corn to Soybeans, from Corn to Wheat, or from Soybeans to Corn?
NC.A: The flow from {Soybeans} to {Corn} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Wheat}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Corn} and {Soybeans}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Barley, Arc Wheat, Arc Corn, Arc Soybeans}.
